title: Bakkotsu Shoujo Giri Giri Purin
description:
This manga follows the story of Moeru Shiratori, a girl whose dream is to become a Pro wrestler and in order to do so she enters the prestigious Academy of Multimedia, however things don't go as planned as she ends up in the performing arts course instead of the pro wrestling course that she had applied to.
Moeru will try to find a way to achieve her dream and become the greatest pro wrestler in the world!

Volume Titles:
1:  純白のサブミッションエンジェル - Junpaku no Sabumisshon'Enjeru - Pure White Submission Angel
2:  あの娘の正体を暴け!! - Ano Musume no Shōtai o Abake!! - Reveal the True Identity of That Girl!!
3:  マルチメディア学園南へ!! - Maruchimedia Gakuenminami e!! - Go to Multimedia Gakuen Minami!!
4:  ステージジャンプアップ!! - Sutējijanpuappu!! - Stage Jump Up!!
5:  真校長登場!! - Ma Kōchō Tōjō!! - True Principal Appearance!!
6:  君の名は…!? - Kiminonaha…!? - Your Name Is...!?
7:  さらばホワイティスワン!! - Saraba Howaitisuwan!! - Farewell White Swan!!
